schema.description:
SCIM Group resource as defined in RFC 7643 Section 4.2.
Represents a group of users.

displayName.description: A human-readable name for the group. REQUIRED

externalId.description:
Identifier for the group as defined by the provisioning client.
Allows the client to maintain their own identifier.

id.description:
Unique identifier for the group. Assigned by the service provider.
MUST be unique across the entire set of resources. Immutable.

members.description: Members of the group (users or nested groups)

$ref.description: The URI of the corresponding User or Group resource

display.description: A human-readable name for the member

value.description: The identifier of the member (user or group ID)

meta.description: Resource metadata as defined in RFC 7643 Section 3.1

created.description: The timestamp when the resource was created

lastModified.description: The timestamp when the resource was last modified

resourceType.description: The name of the resource type (e.g., User, Group)

version.description:
The version of the resource. Used for ETag-based versioning.
Weak ETags are prefixed with W/

meta.title: ResourceMetadata

schemas.description: The schema URIs that define this resource

schema.title: Group
